name: Patrol Guardian
description:
Patrol Guardian is a space shooter prototype where your goal is to defend merchants against pirate attacks, complete mission in order to get stronger and become the ultimate patrol guardian.

Controls:

  • Hold left mouse button to move
  • Space = shoot
  • M = map
  • U = upgrades
  • Right click on map icon for interaction
  • Middle mouse button and drag for vertical camera movement

Feedback:

If you find any bugs in the game let us know! We're always open for suggestions so if you have any good idea's for making the game even better leave a comment or send us an email.
